resources.string: Signing you out and closing app
App Developed By One Silicon Diode ;)

The TakeNotes folder should contain only images, check once!

Delete or Move Unsupported Files

PDF cannot be saved :(

In order to ensure privacy you need to sign in again

From now Onwards you can export your entire TakeNotes Folder into a single PDF file

Ensure that folder contains only those images which you need in the PDF while using this functionality

Happy Note Taking!

Privacy Policy

One Silicon Diode built the Take Notes app as an Open Source app. This SERVICE is provided by One Silicon Diode at no cost and is intended for use as is.

If you choose to use Take Notes, then you agree to the collection and use of information in relation to this policy. NO Data is ever sent, saved or stored in any form neither on the device nor online.

Contact Us
If you have any questions or suggestions about my Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact me at connectwithspandan@gmail.com.
There were no images under the TakeNotes Folder\n\nSave the Image and Try Again!
